The Accounting Research Institute (ARI) is a leading institution recognised as a Higher Education Centre of Excellence (HICoE) by the Malaysian Ministry of Higher Education (MOHE) and is globally renowned for its research in Islamic Financial Criminology.

  • Islamic Financial Criminology & Transaction
  • Governance & Shariah Compliance
  • Corporate Integrity System & Ethics
  • Anti-Money Laundering & Mitigation
  • Methodologies in Financial Fraud Detection

It aims to understand the complex interactions and pathophysiological mechanisms of cardiovascular-related diseases, identify new biomarkers and therapeutic targets, and develop effective prevention, diagnosis, and treatment strategies to reduce the global burden of these interconnected health issues.

  • Cardiac Signalling (Cellular & Molecular Aspects)
  • Cardio-Periodontal Manifestation
  • Metabolic Syndrome & Cardiac Risk Profile
  • Natural Cardioprotective Agents
  • Cardiovascular Diseases & Artificial Intelligence

INSAN acts as a catalyst for innovation through local identity, reinstating and restoring cultural heritage while reflecting its key role in shaping the growth of a sustainable and inclusive creative economy. It preserves cultural heritage and fosters diversity in an increasingly globalized world.

  • Design Technology
  • Performing Arts
  • Music and Sound Art
  • Fine Art

The Accounting Research Institute (ARI) is a leading institution recognised as a Higher Education Centre of Excellence (HICoE) by the Malaysian Ministry of Higher Education (MOHE) and is globally renowned for its research in Islamic Financial Criminology.

  • Islamic Financial Criminology & Transaction
  • Governance & Shariah Compliance
  • Corporate Integrity System & Ethics
  • Anti-Money Laundering & Mitigation
  • Methodologies in Financial Fraud Detection

It aims to understand the complex interactions and pathophysiological mechanisms of cardiovascular-related diseases, identify new biomarkers and therapeutic targets, and develop effective prevention, diagnosis, and treatment strategies to reduce the global burden of these interconnected health issues.

  • Cardiac Signalling (Cellular & Molecular Aspect)
  • Cardio-Periodontal Manifestation
  • Metabolic Syndrome & Cardiac Risk Profile
  • Natural Cardioprotective Agents
  • Cardiovascular Diseases & Artificial Intelligence

The Malaysia Institute of Transport (MITRANS) is a service-based centre of excellence specialising in research, consultancy, and training in transportation and logistics. Its primary goal is to play a leading intellectual role in the strategic planning, development, and management of transportation logistics.

  • Sustainable Transport and Mobility
  • Transport Policy and Standard Development
  • Sustainable Mobility for Minorities
  • Green Transport and Logistics
  • Transport Management and Enforcement

IIESM was established as a Centre of Excellence for green infrastructure materials used in the construction of buildings, highways, bridges, and other infrastructure projects. It focuses on research in civil engineering to address infrastructure and environmental challenges sustainably, utilizing green materials in construction.

  • Green Infrastructure Materials
  • Concrete
  • Repair and Rehabilitation
  • Timber Engineering
  • Pavement Engineering

IOS is a unique multidisciplinary research institute dedicated to advancing fundamental sciences while also promoting research in applied sciences and engineering. Currently, IOS has established three strategic research centres: i) Centre of Chemical Synthesis & Polymer Technology (CCSPT); ii) Centre of Functional Materials & Nanotechnology (CFMN), and iii) Centre of Astrophysics & Applied Radiation (CAAR).

  • Chemical Synthesis & Polymer Technology (CCSPT)
  • Functional Materials & Nanotechnology (CFMN)
  • Astrophysics & Applied Radiation (CAAR)

Text","image_strech":1,"image_order_option":"desktop","click_url":{"type":"url","url":"https://aurins.uitm.edu.my/main/","menu":"","page":0,"popup":0,"action":"","is_no_repeat":0,"new_tab":true,"nofollow":false,"noreferrer":false,"noopener":false,"close_popup":37},"link_apear_in_title":1,"text_content":"

AuRIns was established to advance knowledge and foster innovation in natural products through cutting-edge research and multidisciplinary collaboration, unlocking the chemical and biological potential of plants and microorganisms. It leverages ethnobotanical knowledge to drive applications in pharmaceuticals, functional foods, agriculture, and biotechnology.

  • Phytochemistry and Microbial Metabolites
  • Biological Activities and Molecular Biology
  • Organic and Inorganic Syntheses
  • Computational Chemistry, Chemometry and X-ray Crystallography
  • Analytical Instrumentations and Methods: Chromatographic and Spectroscopic

The Microwave Research Institute (MRI) at Universiti Teknologi MARA, Shah Alam, Malaysia, specialises in microwave engineering and interdisciplinary research. Focused on integrating artificial intelligence and biomedical applications, MRI is at the forefront of advancements in fields ranging from telecommunications to healthcare.

  • Microwave Non-Distractive Test
  • Industrial Sensing & Radar System
  • Computational Electromagnetic
  • Novel Materials
  • Wireless Technology
  • Microwave Mitology
  • Microwave for Bio-Medical Application

iPROMISE focuses on 'Integrative Omics for Wellness,' which involves large-scale analysis of biological molecules such as DNA, RNA, proteins, and metabolites to understand their functions and interactions. Advances in Integrative Omics enable predictive, preventive, personalised, and participatory therapies, taking into account genetic, metabolic, environmental, and lifestyle variations to deliver more effective treatments and interventions.

  • Pharmacogenomics
  • Nutrigenomics
  • Sports Genomics
  • Bioinformatics
  • Metabolomics
  • Proteomics
  • Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery

The Institute of Business Excellence (IBE), a business-driven Centre of Excellence and HRD Corp Registered Training Provider, bridges academia and industry through training, consultancy, and research in business strategy, sustainability, professional development, marketing, retail, and event management. IBE delivers practical solutions to industry challenges, driving sustainable growth.

  • Business & Management
  • Corporate Communication & Event Management (CCEM)
  • Professional & Enterprise Development (PED)
  • Retail & Marketing
  • Business Strategy

SMRI was established in conjunction with our first Symposium on Academia-Industry Collaboration in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Supported by a team of highly knowledgeable experts and equipped with advanced devices and software, SMRI comprises six units, each focused on major fields in engineering, including:

  • Virtual, Advanced and Additive Manufacturing
  • Transport & Infrastructure
  • Medical and Pharmaceutical Engineering
  • Lean Kaizen & Reliability Engineering
  • Robotics, IoT & Big Data Analytics
  • Energy, Oil & Gas

The Institute for Biodiversity and Sustainable Development (IBSD) serves as the central hub for supporting Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) initiatives at UiTM. The institute focuses on biodiversity and sustainable development research through strategic collaborations, playing a crucial role in advancing UiTM's position in the SDG agenda at both national and international levels. Malaysia's tropical rainforests, rich in biodiversity, offer immense potential for research and serve as a key destination for ecotourism, benefiting local communities.

  • Forest Ecology
  • Sustainable Technology
  • Biodiversity & Climate Change
  • Policy & Law
  • Community Development & Socio-economic

The Solar Research Institute (SRI) is a Centre of Excellence at UiTM, leveraging the university's extensive solar assets as living labs. SRI focuses on advancing research and innovation in solar energy and its supporting ecosystem, driving digitalisation and supporting decarbonization efforts to promote a sustainable, low-carbon future.

  • Smart Grid & System Integration
  • Advance & Efficient Technology
  • Infrastructure Agrovoltaic & Supporting Eco-System
  • Socio-Economic, Policy & Climate Change Management

IBDAAI is a Centre of Excellence focused on developing smart solutions for data analytics and social analytics in complex environments. The centre aims to build a collaborative research team that contributes to high-quality research outcomes and impactful solutions. It also provides expert advice through training, consultancy, and commercialisation in Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence. With the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence technology, empowering Big Data Analytics is crucial for addressing future needs. The combination of Big Data Analytics and AI offers optimal solutions to real-world problems.

  • Smart System and Technology
  • Data Processing
  • Data Analytics
  • Decision Making
  • Visualisation
  • Modelling

The Malaysia Institute of Transport (MITRANS) is a service-based centre of excellence specialising in research, consultancy, and training in transportation and logistics. Its primary goal is to play a leading intellectual role in the strategic planning, development, and management of transportation logistics.

  • Sustainable Transport and Mobility
  • Transport Policy and Standard Development
  • Sustainable Mobility for Minorities
  • Green Transport and Logistics
  • Transport Management and Enforcement

IIESM was established as a Centre of Excellence for green infrastructure materials used in the construction of buildings, highways, bridges, and other infrastructure projects. It focuses on research in civil engineering to address infrastructure and environmental challenges sustainably, utilizing green materials in construction.

  • Green Infrastructure Materials
  • Concrete
  • Repair and Rehabilitation
  • Timber Engineering
  • Pavement Engineering

IOS is a unique multidisciplinary research institute dedicated to advancing fundamental sciences while also promoting research in applied sciences and engineering. Currently, IOS has established three strategic research centres: i) Centre of Chemical Synthesis & Polymer Technology (CCSPT); ii) Centre of Functional Materials & Nanotechnology (CFMN), and iii) Centre of Astrophysics & Applied Radiation (CAAR). Our research spans a wide range, from nano-scale materials and supramolecular complexes to polymeric materials. IOS focus on creating and synthesising new molecules for drug discovery, developing smart ionic materials and devices, and exploring topics from chemical reaction mechanisms to the activities of the Sun and the impact of environmental nuclear radiation.

  • Chemical Synthesis & Polymer Technology (CCSPT)
  • Functional Materials & Nanotechnology (CFMN)
  • Astrophysics & Applied Radiation (CAAR)

AuRIns was established to advance knowledge and foster innovation in natural products through cutting-edge research and multidisciplinary collaboration, unlocking the chemical and biological potential of plants and microorganisms. It leverages ethnobotanical knowledge to drive applications in pharmaceuticals, functional foods, agriculture, and biotechnology.

  • Phytochemistry and Microbial Metabolites
  • Biological Activities and Molecular Biology
  • Organic and Inorganic Syntheses
  • Computational Chemistry, Chemometry and x-ray Crystallography
  • Analytical Instrumentations and Methods: Chromatographic and Spectroscopic

The Microwave Research Institute (MRI) at Universiti Teknologi MARA, Shah Alam, Malaysia, specialises in microwave engineering and interdisciplinary research. Focused on integrating artificial intelligence and biomedical applications, MRI is at the forefront of advancements in fields ranging from telecommunications to healthcare.

  • Microwave Non-Distractive Test
  • Industrial Sensing & Radar System
  • Computational Electromagnetic
  • Novel Materials
  • Wireless Technology
  • Microwave Mitology
  • Microwave for Bio Medical Application

iPROMISE focuses on 'Integrative Omics for Wellness,' which involves large-scale analysis of biological molecules such as DNA, RNA, proteins, and metabolites to understand their functions and interactions. Advances in Integrative Omics enable predictive, preventive, personalised, and participatory therapies, taking into account genetic, metabolic, environmental, and lifestyle variations to deliver more effective treatments and interventions.

  • Pharmacogenomics
  • Nutrigenomics
  • Sports Genomics
  • Bioinformatics
  • Metabolomics
  • Proteomics
  • Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery

The Institute of Business Excellence (IBE), a business-driven Centre of Excellence and HRD Corp Registered Training Provider, bridges academia and industry through training, consultancy, and research in business strategy, sustainability, professional development, marketing, retail, and event management. MRI was established in conjunction with our first Symposium on Academia-Industry Collaboration in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Supported by a team of highly knowledgeable experts and equipped with advanced devices and software, SMRI comprises six units, each focused on major fields in engineering, including:

  • Virtual, Advanced and Additive Manufacturing
  • Transport & Infrastructure
  • Medical and Pharmaceutical Engineering
  • Lean Kaizen & Reliability Engineering
  • Robotics, IoT & Big Data Analytics
  • Energy, Oil & Gas

The Institute for Biodiversity and Sustainable Development (IBSD) serves as the central hub for supporting Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) initiatives at UiTM. The institute focuses on biodiversity and sustainable development research through strategic collaborations, playing a crucial role in advancing UiTM's position in the SDG agenda at both national and international levels. Malaysia's tropical rainforests, rich in biodiversity, offer immense potential for research and serve as a key destination for ecotourism, benefiting local communities.

  • Forest Ecology
  • Sustainable Technology
  • Biodiversity & Climate Change
  • Policy & Law
  • Community Development & Socio-economic

The Solar Research Institute (SRI) is a Centre of Excellence at UiTM, leveraging the university's extensive solar assets as living labs. SRI focuses on advancing research and innovation in solar energy and its supporting ecosystem, driving digitalisation and supporting decarbonization efforts to promote a sustainable, low-carbon future.

  • Smart Grid & System Integration
  • Advance & Efficient Technology
  • Infrastructure Agrovoltaic & Supporting Eco-System
  • Socio-Economic, Policy & Climate Change Management

IBDAAI is a Centre of Excellence focused on developing smart solutions for data analytics and social analytics in complex environments. The centre aims to build a collaborative research team that contributes to high-quality research outcomes and impactful solutions. It also provides expert advice through training, consultancy, and commercialisation in Big Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence. With the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence technology, empowering Big Data Analytics is crucial for addressing future needs. The combination of Big Data Analytics and AI offers optimal solutions to real-world problems.

  • Smart System and Technology
  • Data Processing
  • Data Analytics
  • Decision Making
  • Visualisation
  • Modelling
